\begin{document}


\title{{\Large{}EPO-2 Project Milestones and Gantt Charts}}
\maketitle


\section*{Milestone 1: Line follower }
\begin{itemize}
\item 30\% : Robot will follow the straight line 
\item 50\% : Robot will follow Lijn 2 \& 3 (see appendix C) 
\item 70\% : Robot will follow Lijn 4 (see appendix C) 
\item 100\%: Robot can follow the line in the test field 
\end{itemize}

\section*{Milestone 2: Route planner }
\begin{itemize}
\item 10\% : C code operational (PC with gui) 
\item 20\% : UART communication established (Robot can be controlled by
PC remotely) 
\item 40\% : Robot can reach 3 stations 
\item 70\% : Robot can make a new route at any location (adaptability) 
\item 100\% : Robot can scan the whole field 
\end{itemize}

\section*{Milestone 3: Mine sensor }
\begin{itemize}
\item 20\% : Sensor HW is tested with Scope and signal generator 
\item 40\% : Sensor HW is tested with FPGA 
\item 60\% : Sensor HW is mounted on the robot 
\item 80\% : Sensor HW is tested of the full board 
\item 100\% : Sensor HW can complete a challenge 
\end{itemize}

\makeatletter
\@fpsep\textheight
\makeatother

\begin{figure}

\hspace{-5.5cm}
\definecolor{barblue}{RGB}{211,211,0} 
\definecolor{groupblue}{RGB}{239, 118, 51}
\definecolor{linkred}{RGB}{165,0,33}
\renewcommand\sfdefault{phv} 
\renewcommand\mddefault{mc} 
\renewcommand\bfdefault{bc} 
\setganttlinklabel{s-s}{START-TO-START}
\setganttlinklabel{f-s}{FINISH-TO-START}
\setganttlinklabel{f-f}{FINISH-TO-FINISH}
\sffamily 

\vspace{-2.5 cm}

\begin{ganttchart}[ y unit chart=1cm,
x unit=0.9 cm,
canvas/.append style={fill=none, draw=black!5, line width=.5pt },
hgrid style/.style={draw=black!5, line width=1.5pt},
vgrid={*1{draw=black!5, line width=.75pt}},
today=0,
today rule/.style={ 
draw=black!64, dash pattern=on 3.5pt off 4.5pt,
line width=1.5pt 
}, 
today label =Week 4.1,
today label font=\large\bfseries,
title/.style={draw=none, fill=none}, 
title label font=\bfseries\large, 
group label font=\bfseries\large,
title label node/.append style={below=7pt},
include title in canvas=false,
bar label font=\mdseries\large\color{black!70}, 
bar label node/.append style={right=0cm and -160pt}, 
bar/.append style={draw=none, fill=black!63 , line width=.5pt}, 
bar incomplete/.append style={fill=barblue}, 
bar progress label font=\bfseries\small\color{black!70},
bar height=.45,
group incomplete/.append style={fill=groupblue},
group left shift=0, 
group right shift=0,
group height=0.5,
group peaks tip position=0, 
group label node/.append style={right=-0cm and -180pt}, 
group progress label font=\bfseries\small,
link/.style={-latex, line width=1.2pt, linkred}, 
link label font=\scriptsize\bfseries\small, 
link label node/.append style={below left=-13pt and -83pt}]{1}{10}
\gantttitle[ title label node/.append style={below left=7 pt and -5pt} 
]{Weeks:\quad1}{1}
\gantttitlelist{2,...,10}{1} \\ 


\ganttgroup[progress=100]{House rules}{1}{7} \\ 

\ganttgroup[progress=0]{Archive}{1}{1} \\ 

\ganttgroup[progress=0]{Project plan}{1}{1} \\ 

\ganttgroup[progress=0]{Pre-assignments}{1}{1} \\
\ganttbar[ 
progress=0, 
name=P1 ]{ Chapters 2 and 3}{1}{1} \\ 
\ganttbar[ 
progress=0, 
name=P2 ]{ Chapters 4 and 5}{1}{1} \\ 
\ganttbar[ 
progress=0, 
name=P3 ]{ Chapters 6 and 7}{1}{1} \\ 
\ganttbar[ 
progress=0, 
name=P4 ]{Chapter 8}{1}{1} \\ 


\ganttgroup[progress=0]{Documentation}{1}{1} \\
\ganttbar[ 
progress=0, 
name=D1 ]{ Final report}{1}{1} \\ 
\ganttbar[ 
progress=0, 
name=D2 ]{ Final presentation}{1}{1} \\ 


\ganttlink[link type=f-s]{P4}{D1}
link type=f-f,
link label node/.append style=left
]{P4}{D1}



\end{ganttchart} 
\vspace{-1.5cm}

\vspace{30bp}

\caption{Organization, Assignments, and Documentation of the EPO-2 Project 2018. \label{fig:Graphic-visualization,-i.} }
\end{figure}

group left shift=0, 
group right shift=0,
group height=0.5,
group peaks tip position=0, 
group label node/.append style={right=-0cm and -180pt}, 
group progress label font=\bfseries\small,
link/.style={-latex, line width=1.2pt, linkred}, 
link label font=\scriptsize\bfseries\small, 
link label node/.append style={below left=-13pt and -83pt}]{1}{10}

]{Weeks:\quad1}{1}
\gantttitlelist{2,...,10}{1} \\

\ganttbar[ 
progress=0, 
name=C1 ]{Task 1 }{1}{1} \\

progress=0, 
name=C2 ]{Task 2}{1}{1} \\ 
\ganttbar[ 
progress=0, 
name=C3 ]{Task N}{1}{1} \\

\ganttbar[ 
progress=0, 
name=M1 ]{Task 1}{1}{1} \\

\ganttbar[ 
progress=0,
